attributes.action: Do NOT change the May Day bank holiday for the King’s coronation
attributes.additional_details: Delayed Weddings, holidays and important events have been booked far in advance for the existing bank holiday. We do not need a day off for the Kings coronation when it is being held on a Saturday. May Day has its own meaning and of it gets scrapped it’s a dishonour to international workers day
attributes.background: Keep May Day bank holiday as the 01.05.23

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/625155
